website_summaries.verdict: A gentle and lightweight oil perfect for poolside or beach side days.
pros: This is a hydrating option that's free of parabens and is water resistant up to 80 minutes so you can dip in and out of the water while you tan
cons: The price is somewhat high for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Scent is different than before
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years but stopped about a year ago for no reason. So I decided to buy it again. The scent is different. It smells fake now, like a perfume versus the wonderful scent of my old one- which was like pineapple/coconut/summer. Not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great sunblock and moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it always keeps me and my family from burning and moisturizes your skin. I even purchase during the winter months. It smells wonderful and absorbed easily. I gave it 4 stars because even though I love the product I have had a couple bottles delivered and product is leaking everywhere due to the way they package in a bag and the lid is loose. Which is a mess for me and a loss of product I could use.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on skin and does the job of protecting skin while building a nice, burn free tan when used with Alba SPF 30. Love that it’s safer to use than most commercial oils and better for the environment. This is my new summer must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection as an oil
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Was in the sun all day digging by the river, and only applied twice all day. Didn't get burnt at all. Also I like that this is an oil, and that I can transfer it to a smaller spray bottle for camping. And since it is an oil, it might not be for everyone, since you will need to use your hands to make sure you are covered, unlike the spray mists. The scent is also nice, but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Hiker and ProspectorTop Contributor: Hiking

customer_reviews.title: Great non-toxic formula.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, moisturizes, non-toxic, and it works!!! My favorite sunscreen. I have an olive complexion that tans easily so I use this 15 to have some level of protection without the toxicity. Best price is here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Denise HTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Old or wasn't strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: I love Alba Botanica brand. This kept my skin from burning. Smells great. Great moisture. My only issue was that I didn't expect to get such a dark tan. It's a nice tan but, I used it because I was going to be sitting in the sun for a few days. Now I walk into a room all nice and tan. Then walk out of the room looking like an albino. I since bought an Alba sunscreen 45 for the front of me and I'm finally starting to even out.
customer_reviews.author: BambiS

customer_reviews.title: Alba is fantastic, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Does not arrive in original packing, but rather a plastic bag. The oil leaked into the bag and then into the box and was on the other items. Otherwise, Alba is fantastic, no complaints. It smells really nice and isn’t overly oily.
customer_reviews.author: Somer Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loved this on vacation no burning but still got tan didn’t feel greasy
customer_reviews.author: Luvnlucky

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Smells great and is a lot less greasy than regular tanning oils. Skin feels great while on and after, too! I am fair skinned and was out for about a half hour and got some nice color
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Suspect fraud and arrived package leaking with too strong of perfume smell. Says non returnable
customer_reviews.text: Product leaked all within packaging and smells too strong and like perfume. The bottle label was printed/stuck in unevenly and with wrinkles aside from the leakage. Unfortunately says this is non returnable and I suspect this is a home manufactured fake.
customer_reviews.author: Gardencook

customer_reviews.title: Not natural
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed that Alba still uses chemicals like Avobenzone. I'm so fond of this company, but with the scientific data available today, I would expect good companies to switch exclusively to mineral sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: sundropgal

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this stuff! And it works very well. Also for an oil it’s not TOO oily like the cheap synthetic versions.
customer_reviews.author: C Span

customer_reviews.title: Great for the salty beach
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. Went to the virgin islands and brought this along for hydration from the salt water after swimming. Love the smell
customer_reviews.author: flash

customer_reviews.title: This item smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but this time it wasn’t the same. It’s like it was mixed with some other oil. So disappointed. I waited for months for this and to receive Garbage is an understatement. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise F.

customer_reviews.title: Sun pew
customer_reviews.text: this brand is my long-time favorite sun tan product . I love the spray and the oil that keeps my skin soft ... however this one seems to have an underlying “smelly” odor that I do not like? unlike previous purchases I might add ... wonder why ?
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Amazonian=not

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tanning oil
customer_reviews.text: The scent is just lovely, and the oil soaks in pretty well compared to some others I've tried. It doesn't just sit there and slip around leaving you greasy, but rather moisturizes and soaks in with time. It's great and although I use it all the time the bottle still feels almost full. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Protect the reefs and yourself at the same timeime
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. A bit oilier than I'm used to with aerosol products. Very good sunscreen properties. Left some marks on light colored nylon shorts, but washes out.
customer_reviews.author: Larry DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Great dry oil
customer_reviews.text: Great tanning oil, smells great,leaves skin feeling hydrated and smooth.gives you a great tan.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q K

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with no caps are any sealing of any kind, doesn’t protect skin unless you never burn
customer_reviews.text: BOTTLES ARRIVED WITH NO CAPS, not sealed or anything. Didn’t smell the way this product used to. I have used it in past years when Whole Foods used to carry it, and it worked great. This time I got sunburned. Not impressed and very disappointed that this product isn’t the same as it used to be. Very greasy, didn’t feel like “dry oil.” Big thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s not DRY OIL
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely not DRY oil. Was oily. I did get a rash but I did also use the 50 spray so not sure which it came from over all liked product
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA YOUNG

customer_reviews.title: This "dry oil" is not dry!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I understand that "dry oil" is an oxymoron to begin with, but previous dry oils I've used have at least been "non oily" to some degree. This is anything but! It's very oily and it takes lots of scrubbing - not just soap and water - to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: perfect for naturally tan skin. no white residue like most sunscreens
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff! I have been using it on my naturally tan skin for a couple years
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, it smells great and I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying another one soon!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! While it feels oily when it first goes on, it also feels like it's hydrating my skin and didn't feel oily pretty quickly after applying. I also like that it's SPF 15. Most of my natural sunscreens are 30 and higher, and this is nice when I want to let a little more sun in!
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Scent from Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. The smell is heavenly. I B always get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Hale House

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, lets you tan but not burn as long ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, lets you tan but not burn as long as you re-apply as needed. The spray function is ok, but I still had to use my hands to spread it evenly.
customer_reviews.author: constant customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and feels nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sunscreen my son will allow me to apply on him. It smells great and feels nice. We use it year round. During the summer we use an additional sunscreen stick on his face from another brand with a higher SPF since this is only SPF 15.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: ... me break out in a sun rash after use like other oils
customer_reviews.text: This does not make me break out in a sun rash after use like other oils. This feels nice and you get a nice tan.
customer_reviews.author: mccoco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sunscreen that I feel safe using on my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I use Alba sunscreen on my daughter and I wanted a natural sunscreen for me that didn't have quite as high of a SPF. I love this! It smells good and isn't oily or chalky!
customer_reviews.author: harlinl

customer_reviews.title: Good Smell, Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Smells wonderful and provides adequate protection. Also pleased with the price point. My favorite for working on a base tan for the summer months!
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.-Goodskey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's oil so it leaves a bit of a residue, but it smells heavenly and it's not sticky
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Mexico trip and loved the smell. not too strong of a scent and comes in a decent size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Martinez-Loza

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and worked great. Love that I can tan and have a mild sunscreen as well.
customer_reviews.author: llrmb

customer_reviews.title: Very oily and has a great scent. It's not the most protection from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very oily and has a great scent. It's not the most protection from the rays but if you want a light tan using this would be good.
customer_reviews.author: The Dandy Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Very good oil and it smells great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, it will let you get a little dark but without getting burned or red and smells amazing, a lot of comments on it, only 4 stars because it is very oily and stays wet all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: My product had leaked out on to other items that were shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love Alba products! Their sunscreen feels good on your skin too.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a plastic bag with the cap off and the lid slightly unscrewed, so it was leaking all over.
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: No oily feel and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It's a light oil that absorbs quickly, so no oily feel. It smells great and is a nice every day sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Mrgrita

customer_reviews.title: Burnt to a crisp
customer_reviews.text: Went to a waterpark applied 5 times throughout the day went at 10am left at 3 burnt to a crisp dont by absolute rubbish, smells great tho
customer_reviews.author: Bridgeen flynn

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of alba brand items and this is one of my favorites. (shipping this time was poor...the oil leaked, but at least there was nothing else in the box.)
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen with 15 SPF
customer_reviews.text: I use this sunscreen after few days of staying in the sun and my skin is already used to the sun. Caution as it's just 15 SPF and one can burn if the sun is too strong.
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well - love oil so much more than creams.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi

customer_reviews.title: I love the way that this product smells and feels on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way that this product smells and feels on your skin! It doesn't leave you looking oily and I have had people ask numerous times "what smells so good?" I use it as every day sunblock. Wouldn't recommend for the beach unless you apply often!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dague

customer_reviews.title: Suntan oil
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite suntan oil!! It is very hard to find!! Yea Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Coloradogirl7

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunlotion spray
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunlotion spray!!! Used it on my vacation to Hawaii and the smell is so delicious. Definitly will buy it again and again ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, keeps my white ass from getting burned, and did I mention that it smells good?
customer_reviews.author: MegShizzy

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff...nice smell too! Not for long periods in the sun. I always keep some around.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: Cap wasn't closed, leaked all over and was about 1/2 full at most
customer_reviews.author: hannah stone

customer_reviews.title: It's primary ingredients by volume are all oils and it certainly feels like it. Other dry oils I have used either ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how they classify this as a "dry" oil. It's primary ingredients by volume are all oils and it certainly feels like it. Other dry oils I have used either soak in more quickly or actually go on dryer. This is like taking olive oil and pouring it on your body. Felt greasy and wet even after having it on for a couple of hours. For those that are concerned by ingredients you should read the other reviews. On a positive note it does smell great.
customer_reviews.author: tctopcat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen protection, environmentally safe and has a wonderful fragrance and is light on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this oil. It’s wonderfully tropical.
customer_reviews.author: D-N-S ♥️

customer_reviews.title: but it smells amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the L'Oreal sunscreen oil. This one is too oily, but it smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thai

customer_reviews.title: so I was pleased to find it online and have it delivered
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this suntan dry oil. It is hard to find, so I was pleased to find it online and have it delivered. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SAllen

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and worked great
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and worked great...just be sure to wrap it in a plastic bag when yraveling!! it leaked and ruined all my linen clothes;( But I loved it...and that it really saturated and hydrates deep and I felt I got a better tan because of it!
customer_reviews.author: John Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: My go-to summer sunscreen. I'm usually generous and will share sunscreen when asked. But not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Edgington

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but BEWARE, it stains white clothing! It made my new white shirt look like I had slathered in self-tanner, which this isn't! Fortunately, it washed out after several launderings.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Waddle

customer_reviews.title: Yum.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like coconut and the beach and works great. Stays on well too. I use it when we go to the pool at 4-5 in the afternoon (as opposed to what I'd use in the middle of the day). Protects well and is a delight to wear. Makes you nice and shiny too.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fast shipping! This hard to find product was exactly what I was looking for at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bodeen

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spray. I'm a fan of oils versus lotions. I even used this on my face and it wasn't too oily (but I also use oil on my face on a daily basis). It did not irritate my eyes or make me itchy ( I have very sensitive skin). I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Luca B.

customer_reviews.title: Good sun screen
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product on Amazon for two years now. Love the scent it is not overpowering and smells clean and fresh. It works as a sunscreen for about 2 hours, I time the use. Then I don't have on some chemical sunscreen for hours, just for the time I need it to work. This will not hold up to mowing the grass for 3 hours from like 11 am to 2 pm. I would burn. I mow after 2 pm when the UV is a bit lower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen For Those Allergic To Parabens
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to parabens and other common ingredients in many lotions, my skin becomes red and breaks out in little bumps. I tried Alba Botanica Hawaiian Coconut Dry Oil Sunscreen SPF 15 and was able to stay in the sun for 2 hours in South Florida in March with no sunburn and no allergic reaction. (I have medium complexion and use their 30 SPF product if I'm going to be out all day in the middle of the summer.) If you are allergic to parabens or other ingredients found in most lotions, this is your sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: I.M. Here

customer_reviews.title: Best adult sunscreen out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen for adults! We've used it for 9 years and have never burned with it. And it smells so good I've used it as a perfume, moisturizer on our night out! So yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed in the changes made. Used to be a great product. Won’t order again 😢
customer_reviews.text: I have been a longtime user. Only sunscreen I used. Worked beautifully, smelled WONDERFUL! Like coconut, the beach, summer. Not overpowering. This last order something has apparently changed. There is now a strong, offensive, perfume-y, nauseating odor. I can’t use it anymore. Why would they do this?? What a shame. Throwing this bottle away and searching for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Weber

customer_reviews.title: BUYING MORE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have already had a sunburn using a different product so decided to try this and it’s Amazing! Smells fantastic and My skin has a nice tan color no redness whatsoever. A little goes a long way also which is nice unlike most lotions, definitely Rated Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: LeFry12

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Good for sun tanning, and I think it prevents skin from drying in chlorine pool water. It is oily and might not be the best for a beach trip though; sand sticks to skin easily.
customer_reviews.author: V-dog

customer_reviews.title: My FAVE dry oil
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way this product smells. Amazing dry oil with a hint of sunscreen, it's my go to for my legs every time I'm in the sun. Everyone always asks to use it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite sunscreen. It smells great, goes on easy, moistures my skin, and protects me from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Pooltime Worthy 💎💎
customer_reviews.text: I thought this countless times. I love everything from their line. After it soaks in you can take it into the pool as well!
customer_reviews.author: Inspirehealth4life

customer_reviews.title: Great product and smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and worked well for tanning. Not so much for blocking the sun due to the low SPF.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: In love with this tanning oil! It smells wonderful and nourishes my skin.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: Not a “dry” oil.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a “dry” oil, it’s heavy and oily, the same as if you squeezed it from a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Oily!
customer_reviews.text: Super oily on the skin. I put it on and took it right off in the shower. Smells good!
customer_reviews.author: Rainfly13

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Wished it came in a larger bottle. Skin feels so soft after use
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J. Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this a few times easy to use good coverage smells great.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Feels like tanning lotion but provides some protection. I haven't burned yet while using this. Love the smell, and feel. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, moisturizing, low level sun protection but still nice for areas that need less protection
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty Free Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Was looking for a cruelty free sunscreen with SPF 15 and I found it! Just wish the bottle was a bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and works well once you have your base tan.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Seems a little expensive but does smell good.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I ordered bug spray w/sunscreen. Somehow I got only oil. Seems a little expensive but does smell good.
customer_reviews.author: blhenze

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on the skin! I used it mainly on my legs and arms and it was like a hydrating moisturizer and sunscreen in one! I also purchased Alba 30SPF and used that on chest and also highly recommend. It soaked into skin instantly, didn't leave a white hue and gave full protection from burning. Made our Hawaii trip stress free!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie B

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. Love the smell and that it has more ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Love the smell and that it has more spf than most tanning oil. Most importantly, I like the all natural ingredients. I feel good knowing that I'm not bombarding my skin with chemicals before I get out in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite oil for tanning outside!!!! Also smells like heaven and Hawaii! :) Have bought this before but this deal is better than stores!
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sunscreen! Its smells soooooooo good, I use it on myself and my child and it doesn't bother our skin at all and we never burn w/it on. The spray is so much more convienent.
customer_reviews.author: annamarie0906

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and goes on smoothly. I don't feel like I'm wearing sunscreen. It's a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hyjek

customer_reviews.title: Pump broke
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is pump stopped pumping the 1st day. So that was a disappointment, oil smells very tropical, & feels nice on my skin otherwise, just wish it was able to pump to reach the areas I cannot.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: very good EWG rating!!!
customer_reviews.text: searched for something that wont smell like "dog" ( hey I love dogs but don;t want to smell like one- lol") has a very good healthy rating on the EWG ( environmental working group) the smell of coconut is refreshing... I love it~!~ third summer using it!
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: The smell of coconut is gone!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of coconut is gone. No scent. I won't be buying anymore. What's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Brian L Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Oily
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is awesome. Only thing was id consider it oil and not dry oil. Which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I love to use this instead of lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this instead of lotion. Absorbs easily and has a great fragance. I'm sensitive to smells but this does not bother me. Keeps my skin moisturized longer than lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer dose not work on this bottle, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer dose not work on this bottle, but it can of course be poured. Not sure why it is called 'dry' oil as it is oily.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Branson & Barbara Branson

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen I've ever used! It makes yours skin feel so good, even after you shower, very moisturised!
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Light and emollient and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Wear this on my arms every single day in the summer. Light and emollient and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas V.

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent dry oil!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite dry oil! It moisturizes and has SPF! What more could I ask for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: great natural oil
customer_reviews.text: Spreads easy and last very long. I get a great tan when using and it smells amazing. My favorite all natural oil.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Suntan Lotion on the market
customer_reviews.text: The product has enough protection with SPF 15 and helps give you an even tan with no burning. It also is not greasy like many traditional suntan lotions. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Plafata

customer_reviews.title: Messy!
customer_reviews.text: This is very oily! The oil never really dried down and was terribly messy.
customer_reviews.author: jojo-potatoes

customer_reviews.title: Contains Avobenzone
customer_reviews.text: Contains Avobenzone, despite the item description showing that it does not. Was looking for sunscreen without.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Greasy And Poor Protection
customer_reviews.text: Super greasy formula...maybe would work okay poolside but bad for the beach. Reapplied three times over four hours (already had a base tan) and came home FRIED.
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas123

product_meta.title: Alba Botanica Coconut Oil Hawaiian Dry Oil SPF 15 Sunscreen, 4.5 oz.
product_meta.description: Style Name:Coconut Dry OilProtect your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays with Alba Botanica Coconut Oil Hawaiian Dry Oil SPF 15 Sunscreen. This lightweight sunscreen is made with a silky oil blend that absorbs quickly for a smooth finish without a heavy or greasy feeling. Botanical emollients such as coconut oil, shea butter and safflower seed oil nourish and moisturize your skin. This formula helps protect against sunburn and is water resistant for up to 40 minutes. Our reef-friendly formula is made with 100% vegetarian ingredients, and it does not contain any oxybenzone or octinoxate. It's also not tested on animals. Includes one 4.5 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Coconut Oil Hawaiian Dry Oil SPF 15 Sunscreen. At Alba Botanica, our product family constantly evolves alongside health, beauty, and ingredient knowledge and trends. We’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. Do beautiful – that’s the motto that motivates our body loving products that nourish the skin, hair and, of course, the soul.
feature_bullets: One 4.5 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Coconut Oil Hawaiian Dry Oil SPF 15 Sunscreen
Lightweight sunscreen made with a quick-absorbing silky oil blend
Provides broad spectrum protection, is water resistant for up to 40 minutes and is coral reef friendly
No oxybenzone, octinoxate or animal testing
